entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Airport 3:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: SSW 20 km/h

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
